scripts.services:install: npm-run-all --parallel api:install ws:install engine:install mm:install frontend:install tickerWorker:install
scripts.services:dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "API,WS,ENGINE,FRONTEND,MM,TICKERWORKER" -c "red,green,blue,yellow,magenta,cyan" "cd api && npm run dev" "cd ws && npm run dev" "cd engine && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd mm && npm run dev" "cd tickerWorker && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "DB-DEV,DB-REFRESH,SERVICES" -c "red,green,blue" "npm run db:dev" "npm run db:refresh:views" "npm run services:dev"
